name: Solid Fuel
description:
Description

Launch a missile down a randomly-generated, endless obstacle course at irresponsible speed!

The game is in alpha and is not finished. Feel free to mention any bugs or features that would work well in an email at stuartmlaing@gmail.com. Put "Solid Fuel" in the subject so the filter sorts it.

Controls

The game currently supports mouse for menus and keyboard for gameplay. Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move, and left mouse for interacting with buttons in menus. Escape and P to pause the game.

Credits

Stuart Laing - Game Design, Programming and Art. 

Made with Unreal Engine 4, Blender, GIMP, KRITA, and Audacity.

Specs

  • Windows 7 or later
  • A CPU of some description
  • Enough RAM (not a lot)
  • ~720 MB hard dive space
  • Preferably a GPU of some kind
  • Mouse and Keyboard
  • Monitor
